item.title: Sony will pass on tariff costs to U.S. consumers by hiking Playstation 5 prices
item.description: The PlayStation 5 is currently the most popular gaming console in America.

item.title: ‘This isn’t about free speech. I’m sure they’re gonna holler that’: Minnesota sues TikTok, accusing it of preying on the young
item.description: The lawsuit, filed in state court, alleges that TikTok is violating Minnesota laws against deceptive trade practices and consumer fraud.

item.title: OpenAI’s chairman says ChatGPT is ‘obviating’ his own job—and says AI is like an ‘Iron Man suit’ for workers
item.description: Bret Taylor says computer programmers like himself may face an existential crisis.

item.title: Washington DC leads America in unemployment rate for 3rd straight month
item.description: D.C.'s jobless rate reached 6% in July, a reflection of the mass layoffs of federal workers, and collapsing international tourism.

item.title: Why the NFL drafted Microsoft’s gen AI for the league’s next big play
item.description: The NFL and Microsoft announced a new multiyear partnership extension that includes the deployment of 2,500 Microsoft Surface Copilot+ PCs.
